field.label: Embargo
field.hint:
You must fill out and hand in to your department a copy of the form Délai de diffusion (embargo) d'un mémoire ou d'une thèse before selecting one of the embargo options otherwise it will be refused. (More info...)
Please note: The embargo will only delay access to the document. The metadata (author, title, abstracts, keywords) will be publicly available.

field.label: Title
field.hint:
Enter the title of your thesis or dissertation as written on your front page. Do not add a period at the end of the title (exception for abbreviations). Use a colon and a space to separate title from subtitle.
We recommend entering Unicode characters for symbols and non-latin characters in the title/summary/keyword fields.
E.g.: (1) Robust H∞ stabilization of stochastic hybrid systems with wiener process
(2) Diffusions élastiques α-α et α-Li⁶ par la méthode de la coordonnée génératrice
If you prefer, you can also enter LaTeX code, especially for more complex mathematical formulas or formulas that could not be rendered with the aforementioned means. The LaTeX code is interpreted between \(...\) tags and between $$...$$ tags for block rendering.
E.g.: (1) \(f(n) \notin \Theta(g(n))\) becomes \(f(n) \notin \Theta(g(n))\) inline.
(2) $$f(n) \notin \Theta(g(n))$$ will display the same formula in a separate block.
field.required: Vous devez inscrire le titre de votre thèse ou de votre mémoire.

field.label: Author
field.hint: Enter your last and (complete) first name as written on the title page of your thesis or dissertation.
field.required: You must provide your first and last name.

field.label: ORCID ID
field.hint:
Enter, if you have one, your ORCID ID. Ex.: 0000-0002-1825-0097.
For more information on the ORCID ID, please visit the web site.

field.label: Degree
field.hint:
Select the degree you will be granted upon completion of your programme.
If necessary, consult the Office of the Registrar web site.

field.label: Programme
field.hint: Select the name of the programme in which you are registered from the following list. It should be the same as the one appearing on the cover of your thesis or dissertation.
field.required: You must choose the name of your program.

field.label: Study level
field.hint: Select the level of study of your programme.
field.required: You must select between the two level of study.

field.label: Document date
field.hint: Enter the date (month + year) of submission for your thesis or dissertation as it appears on the title page of your document.
field.required: You must enter the document date.

field.label: Advisor(s)
field.hint:
Enter the last and complete first name of your advisor(s).
Use the "Add" button to add a co-advisor. Do not add the names of other jury members.
field.required: You must ad the name of your advisor.

field.label: Language
field.hint: Select the primary language in which your thesis or dissertation is written. The primary language is the one used in the introduction and conclusion if your document includes articles in a different language.

field.label: Keywords
field.hint: Enter each French and English subject keywords that you included in your thesis or dissertation. Only use capital letters for the first letter of each keyword and for proper nouns. Use one text box for each keyword. Click on the "Add" button to add more boxes. One keyword can however contains several words e.g. "North Atlantic Treaty Organization" (view online example).

field.label: ProQuest/UMI subject
field.hint: To increase the discoverability of your thesis or dissertation, choose the primary subject of your thesis or dissertation from the following standardized subject list provided by ProQuest/UMI.
field.required: You must select a subject from the list.

field.label: Abstracts
field.hint:
Enter the French abstract of your thesis or dissertation. Then click on the "Add" button and enter the English abstract.
If any, add abstracts in other languages in distinct text boxes.

field.label: Related research dataset(s)
field.hint:
If you wish to refer a research dataset linked to your thesis or dissertation, enter here the identifier (DOI or URL) of this dataset.
Use the "Add" button to add a link to a another dataset.
Ex.: doi:10.5683/SP2/9EBRRR
For more information on data sharing, consult the Libraries guide on research data management [fr].

field.label: Note(s)
field.hint: If necessary, enter any complementary information related to your document. E.g. co-mentorship. This information will be disclosed publicly. In the specific case of creative dissertations, please enter here "Mémoire en recherche-création / Creative dissertation" (using this exact syntax).

field.label: Title
field.hint: Enter the name of the file.
field.required: You must enter a name for this file

field.label: Description
field.hint: Enter a description for the file

field.label: Author
field.hint: Enter the author's name (Family name, Given names).

field.label: Title
field.hint: Enter the main title of the item.
field.required: You must enter a main title for this item.

field.label: Other Titles
field.hint: If the item has any alternative titles, please enter them here.

field.label: Date of Issue
field.hint: Please give the date of previous publication or public distribution. You can leave out the day and/or month if they aren't applicable.
field.required: You must enter at least the year.

field.label: Publisher
field.hint: Enter the name of the publisher of the previously issued instance of this item.

field.label: Citation
field.hint: Enter the standard citation for the previously issued instance of this item.

field.label: Series/Report No.
field.hint: Enter the series and number assigned to this item by your community.

field.label: Identifiers
field.hint: If the item has any identification numbers or codes associated with it, please enter the types and the actual numbers or codes.

field.label: Type
field.hint: Select the type of content of the item.

field.label: Language
field.hint: Select the language of the main content of the item. If the language does not appear in the list, please select 'Other'. If the content does not really have a language (for example, if it is a dataset or an image) please select 'N/A'.

field.label: Subject Keywords
field.hint: Enter appropriate subject keywords or phrases.

field.label: Abstract
field.hint: Enter the abstract of the item.

field.label: Sponsors
field.hint: Enter the names of any sponsors and/or funding codes in the box.

field.label: Description
field.hint: Enter any other description or comments in this box.

relation-field.label: Author
relation-field.hint: Enter the author's name (Family name, Given names).
